data.name: MeecheenMe
data.detailed_description:
A crazy online third person shooter.
The fun really starts with the character customization. Not only can you make custom skins, but also custom taunts for everyone to see!
Enjoy fooling around mid fight with your custom character, custom taunts, and proximity voice chat!

Featuring game modes such as...
-Payload
-Control Point
-King of the Hill
-Attack & Defend
-Deathmatch & Team Deathmatch
and more...

This game has a high skill ceiling, but can also be enjoyed by those who don't want to try so hard!
Don't be afraid to ask the veteran players for a tip or two!

data.short_description: A crazy online third person shooter. Create and import Custom Models & Custom Taunts for everyone to see!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD A4-3400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence, as well as unknown mature content due to the freedom of the character customization.
